mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{username}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{profile_img});
mapper.select: SELECT userid, username, birthday, email, profile_img FROM members WHERE member_no=#{member_no};
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET profile_img= #{profile_img} WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
